members.name: Sam Rowland
members.description: I’m Sam Rowland, a sophomore majoring in computer science. In previous classes, I have learned to program using Python, Java, and many general programming skills, such as working with objects, functions, and data types.

members.name: Saeshu Karthika
members.description: I’m Saeshu Karthika, a sophomore majoring in Computer Science. My current focus has been on learning Java and Python programming languages. Additionally, as a minor in Data Science, I am delving into the creation of models from data, as well as their testing and training, primarily using Python.
